content.zh-hans:
Why Private Deployment?

掌控您的商业命运

database

数据完全主权

用户数据、订单信息私有化存储，不经过第三方平台，彻底杜绝数据泄露与商业机密窃取风险。

savings

零佣金抽成

告别平台高昂的交易佣金（如 Shopify 的 2%）。一次性买断或按年订阅技术服务，交易额越高越划算。

extension

无限二次开发

拥有完整源代码。基于微服务架构，您的技术团队可以随意修改核心逻辑，打造完全贴合业务的系统。
content.en:
Why Private Deployment?

Take Control of Your Business

database

Data Sovereignty

User data and orders stored privately, no third-party platform, eliminating data leaks and IP risks.

savings

Zero Commission

No transaction fees (e.g. Shopify 2%). One-time or annual subscription—the more you sell, the more you save.

extension

Unlimited Customization

Full source code. Microservices architecture lets your team modify core logic to fit your business.
